content: As you reach the site of the Shrine, you’ll need to deal with an angry Crow Diviner who guards it (these types of enemies don’t respawn, thankfully). Be wary of their fast reverse blade swings and jumping claw kicks, and rest up after they’ve been defeated.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Snake Trail'.
The content is as follows:
As you reach the site of the Shrine, you’ll need to deal with an angry Crow Diviner who guards it (these types of enemies don’t respawn, thankfully). Be wary of their fast reverse blade swings and jumping claw kicks, and rest up after they’ve been defeated.
